alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 03 at 3:02PM CST until January 04 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will be below freezing, so a glaze of ice on raised surfaces and some roadways is possible. Please slow down if you are traveling overnight due to potential slick conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
